sentences.en: A chair and ottoman can become a chaise when put together.
sentences.cn: 全新设计的沙发椅+脚蹬,拼接起来可以作为躺椅使用.

sentences.en: A chaise from Lichfield pulls up at the entrance to the market square.
sentences.cn: 从利奇菲耳德来的一辆马车在市场入口处停住了.

sentences.en: And her agitated hand waved to them from a chaise window, and she was gone.
sentences.cn: 她从车窗里向他们挥动着激动的手, 走了.

sentences.en: Magna was lying on a chaise longue.
sentences.cn: 玛格娜躺在一把躺椅上.

sentences.en: Oh! but the gentlemen will have Mr. Bingley's chaise to go to Meryton; and the Hursts have no horses to theirs.
sentences.cn: 噢, 彬格莱先生的马车要送他的朋友到麦里屯去, 赫斯脱夫妇又是有车无马.

sentences.en: Our chaise slugged home in the storm.
sentences.cn: 我们的马车在暴风雪中缓慢地往家走.

sentences.en: The pompous procession therefore wended its way towards P è re - la - Chaise from the Faubourg Saint - Honor é .
sentences.cn: 所以那庄严的送殡行列就从 圣·奥诺 路出发向拉雪兹神父墓地前进.

sentences.en: What could happen to a beautiful girl sleeping in the chaise lounge on the sunny beach?
sentences.cn: 美丽的女孩就是魔法的代名词,在阳光充足的海滩上将会发生什么 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: （供一人或两人乘坐的）轻便马车
trans.tran_en: a light open horse-drawn carriage, esp one with two wheels designed for two passengers
